Text:

Thanks, mates - I'm on it at as we speak - learning something new everyday.

Strange thing, really - if it wasn't for porn, who would've bothered learning all these things. And more important, who'd even take the time and effort programming all these nice progs that we're all using to make it all available for others.

He-he! Without porn, internet would've been so boring!
